11.content: Why does Timmy wear diapers?
11.title: Timmy

1111.content:
Wanda and Cosmo had to go to a parenting class in fairy land. Poof had been misbehaving and they needed to know how to control him. They decided to leave Timmy with Poof to babysit. Timmy and poof spent the whole weekend watching tv and eating candy. On Monday morning, Cosmo and Wanda poofed into Timmy's room and saw them both still watching tv with candy wrappers by their feet. Poofs diaper was leaking due to the fact that he hadn't been changed all weekend.
"Timmy!" Wanda yelled
Timmy nearly jumped out of his seat when Wanda yelled
"I expected you to be a good babysitter, but instead you guys just watched tv all weekend" Wanda yelled
"sorry" Timmy said half heartedly
"and look at Poof, he has a diaper rash and his stomach will be hurting for weeks because of all the candy he ate, you are so irresponsible" Wanda continued
"sorry" Timmy said again
"you won't be sorry till you know what it's like to be a baby" Wanda said and then got an idea
"sorry" Timmy said a third time
"I forgive you, if you let me show you what its like to be poof" Wanda said
"okay" Timmy replied
Wanda waved her wand and Timmy's room turned into a nursery for a ten year old boy. There were diapers, a crib, a changing table, and lots of baby powder and wipes.
"you're gonna treat me like a baby?" Timmy asked
"no, your parents and Vicky are. Part of the spell is that everyone thinks that you wearing diapers is normal, ohh, and you're incontinent" Wanda said smiling
"what's incogbapent?" Timmy asked
"incontinent, it's when you can't control your poop or pee." Wanda explained
Wanda and Cosmo poofed back into their bowl and left Timmy alone in his room. Timmy heard someone walking up the stairs and soon, Vicky opened the door,
"what are you wearing twerp, wheres your diaper?" Vicky asked and grabbed a diaper from the pile in the corner.
Vicky walked back over to Timmy and pulled down his pants. Vicky decided to ______________ before putting Timmy into a diaper.
1111.title: Wanda

111321.content:
Timmy was sitting at lunch as bored as could be. Wand and Cosmo took Poof to some fairy family program, Chester and AJ were off working on their science project together which of course Timmy won't even try to do because Mr. Crocker would fail him anyway, and there was no crisis to fix today. Timmy just sat at his usual lunch table trying to scarf down the disgusting lunch food. Once Timmy was full, he got up out of his seat to throw his remaining food away. Little did Timmy know that his crush, Trixie Tang, was passing by him right as he got up causing them both to smash their food into their clothes. Everyone in the cafeteria started laughing at your and Trixie's pratfalls. Timmy could only stair in shock of what he had just done. Trixie on the other hand was furious at Timmy for embarrassing her like that and grabs you by the hand and yells, "Look what you did to me!"

"I..I'm so so sorry Trixie," you apologize.

"Sorry's not gonna cut it," Trixie screams.

Then Trixie hanks you up and drags you out of the cafeteria and takes you to the Lost and Found bin to get clothes for you and her. Trixie found a pair of her own clothes that she kept at school just in case a situation like this occurred. You are about to look through the bin and grab yourself some clothes when Trixie says, "Don't bother looking through there, I already picked out what you're gonna wear."

"What?" Timmy asks.

"This," Trixie says.

Trixie reveals a pink diaper and a big poofy pink dress. "I'm not wearing that," Timmy says.

"Oh yes you are," Trixie commands, "You embarrassed me in the cafeteria and this is my revenge now come here and get changed."

You don't know what to do. You don't want anyone seeing you in that outfit but on the other hand, getting diapered by Trixie does sound like a fun experience. So you decide to...

Then, without warning, Trixie rips off Timmy's underwear. Timmy reaches down to cover his crotch but Trixie just moves Timmy's hands to the side. "Wow," Trixie laughs, "I guess you'd look like a baby with or without the clothes."

Then Trixie grabs lotion and powder and starts applying it to his crotch and butt. The whole experience of his dream girl rubbing him all over, has caused Timmy to become hard. Well I can't get your diaper on with this in the way and I'm not giving you any rewards since you were the one who humiliated me so..."

"Of course I can." replied Trixie. "Also if I catch you trying to run away or take off your clothes, then Hans here will beat you to a pulp." A 6' Hans steps out from behind a corner and looks menacingly at Timmy. Timmy gulps.

While walking back to class, Timmy wondered how he was going to deal with this humiliation. He didn't have Cosmo and Wanda to help him so he had to figure out a solution on his own. He decides to...

111321112.content:
"Hello? Vicky?" Timmy tried to keep his voice down.

"WHAT DO YOU WANT TWERP?" Vicky screams into the phone.

"I need you to come pick me up from school. I'm sick." Timmy said, shaking in fear. He looks around the hallway and notices a group of underclassmen walking towards him and starts panicking.

"Ugh! Alright, fine. But if you aren't really sick I'll make sure you need to go to the hospital." Vicky seethed.

Meanwhile Timmy had to deal with a group of kids about to see him in his getup.

He tried to...
111321112.title: Call Vicky and ask her to pick him up

1113211122.content:
Noticing an open locker, Timmy jumps inside and slams the door shut. He peers out of the grates to see who was walking by and starts shaking when he realizes it was the junior soccer team. Although he was older than all of them, they could easily beat them up with their superior leg strength!

As they walk by they all stop to open their lockers. Timmy closes his eyes as here's the creak of combination locks outside.

Suddenly he hears laughter and the sound of mobile phones snapping pictures. To his horror, the locker he was hiding in belonged to one of the 3rd graders.

"Isn't that Timmy Turner?" One boy asked between giggles.

"Oh my god it is." another boy replied. "Do you need diapers or something Timmy?"

"N-no! I u-uh got diapered by this girl-" Timmy tried to explain.

"A girl!" A third boy shouted enthusiastically. "That's pathetic."

"Have you wet yourself yet? Baby turner?" The first guy asked. "I know! Let's bottle feed him!"

The three boys took out their water bottles and started forcing Timmy to drink each one. By the end he must have had over a liter and a half of water.

"Well baby, we have to go, but make sure you don't take off that diaper, or we'll make sure every kid in school sees these photos." The last boy said with a grin.

Timmy looked at his phone which buzzed with a text message: Vicky: "HERE!"
1113211122.title: Hide

11132111221.content:
Vicky looked down at Timmy with eyes that lacked any sort of pity.

"Well twerp, it looks like you've outdone yourself this time. You've made my job as easy as it gets." Vicky said icily.

Before he could explain Vicky picked up Timmy, tossed him in a booster seat and forced him to start eating a jar of baby food under penalty of spanking.

"Vicky, I- slurp- can explain!" Timmy exclaimed between bites of the mashed peas.

"SAVE IT! I missed my lunch period because of you. I WAS GONNA HAVE CORN DOGS!" Vicky yelled, "I'm taking you to the daycare down the road so that they can deal with you."

Timmy, despite not wanting to go to daycare, actually breathed a sigh of relief. At least there, nobody would see him in that getup.
11132111221.title: Go outside and meet Vicky

1113212.content:
You (Timmy) come to your senses just mere inches from Trixie. You immediately stop, and turn on your heel.
You run as fast as away. Then you realize that you haven't moved at all.
You look behind and see a now furious Trixie staring at you.
Trixe said, "And where do you think your going?"
She then pulls down your pants and underwear, in one swift move and has you over her lap before you even know it.
She begins furriously spanking you.
This goes on for about 5 minutes.
At the end you are balling just like an infant.
Trixie then says, "Well I was going to be nice, and let you cover your diaper. But now your just going to be wearing your diaper for the rest of the week."
At that comment, she quickly diapers you. And then duct tapes your diaper shut so you couldn't open it without help.

Trixie then pats your padded behind and says, smirking, "Enjoy using that diaper for the rest of the week."

Timmy really want wear diapers, and be treated like baby, he remember the day in the daycare when he became a baby, but he want that all the kids wear diapers too. timmy says to cosmo and wanda "i wish that tomorrow all the kids wear diapers and be treated like babies". The next day timmy wake up in a crib, with a onesie and with a wet diaper. timmy is impressed with the changes, then his mom start to change his diaper. timmy it was dress in a pink baby hat, a pink shirt with a little bear, pants that do not hide their thick diapers and his shoes. 11522.content: Timmy turns himself into a baby to help...
11522.title: Other

115221.content:
(This takes place before Poof)

Timmy's parents had just left and Vicky was on her way over to keep an eye on him, and Timmy had come up with an interesting idea, that if he turned himself into a baby, maybe Vicky wouldn't be as mean to him? It was worth a shot, so he went into the living room with his fairy god parents.

"Timmy, are you sure this is a good idea, if Vicky acts like she usually does, you'll be helpless." Wanda voiced her concern.

"Well, that's a risk I'm willing to take, I wish I was a baby and that everyone in the world, except you guys and me, thought I was a baby." Timmy said.

Wanda then raised her wand and Timmy poofed into a baby, in nothing but a pink hat and a diaper. Then his fairies poofed away as suddenly Vicky burst through the door, she spotted Timmy on the floor straight away, immediately she picked him up, and then put him into a large playpen. Then she dropped a bottle of milk in there with him.

"Go nuts." She said sarcastically and then she walked away to go watch tv.

'Yes! She's way less mean to me now!' Timmy thought to himself as he picked up the bottle and sucked on it.

'Now to just lay here and relax until Vicky leaves, then change things back to normal.' Timmy thought as he lay there.
115221.title: With Vicky

1152211.content:
As Timmy laid there sucking on the bottle, his eyelids drooped, and suddenly he felt really tired. In a few short moments he had fallen asleep.

It wasn't until sometime later that Timmy opened his eyes to see bars around him, sitting up, he saw he was in a crib, in what looked like his room, if he was a baby, which he was. The other thing he noticed immediately was that the diaper strapped around his waist was discolored yellow and felt really squishy. A quick sniff of the air confirmed it was wet. He reached for the pink rattle next to him, when suddenly it came to life and poofed into Wanda.

"Oh good Timmy, you're awake. I was afraid you were going to sleep until tomorrow." Wanda said.

The room was illuminated by a night light in the corner, it was dark outside.

"Your parents came home an hour ago and your mom put you in this crib. You were sleeping so peacefully, I didn't want to wake you up." Wanda finished.

"Wella wisi was bawk do ormel." Timmy spoke, then realized he couldn't talk normally without his teeth.

"Timmy, I can't make a wish if I can't understand you. Here, take these, I know there isn't a lot of them though." Wanda said as she picked up some blocks with letters on them and dropped them into the crib.

Timmy took them and began to spell out. 'I wish I was..' He only had enough blocks to spell out.
1152211.title: Timmy falls asleep.

choices: Timmy wakes up later that night.
Timmy wakes up in the morning.
11522111.content:
'I wish I was three.'

"Alright then sport." Wanda said as she raised her wand and poof.

Timmy turned into a three year old as everything changed around him. His room changed as well to reflect him being three, no longer in a crib, he was instead on a bed, with small rails. His attire had changed too, turning from a wet diaper to some pink footie pajamas with a bigger wet diaper underneath them. There was still a changing table in the room though.

"Great I can talk now." Timmy said, testing his powers of speech.

"Alright, I wish-" Timmy was interrupted as the door to his room opened, and Wanda turned into a pink cat doll, landing on the bed.

His mother had barged into the room and was looking at Timmy standing on the bed, she sniffed once and then descended on her son, lifting him off the bed. "Alright, let's get you changed." She said as she laid him onto the changing table, taking his pajamas off as she did. Timmy squirmed a little on the changing table, blushing at the thought of having his mom change his diaper, but ultimately he couldn't do anything right now. So his mom un-taped the diaper, then tossed it into a nearby pail, then she wiped Timmy up and then sprinkled some baby power onto him. Grabbing a new diaper and getting it underneath her sons butt, then she brought it up and taped it securely.

"There, all nice and fresh." His mom said as she took Timmy over to his bed, and laid him down under the covers.

She then began to read Timmy a story, and as much as he tried to stay awake, he couldn't fight the drowsiness overtaking him.
11522111.title: I wish I was three

115221112.content:
Timmy woke up the next morning to find himself on the changing table again. His mother standing over him as she taped a new diaper onto him.

"You are just a little soaker aren't you." His mother cooed as she put a new diaper onto him.

Then she picked him up and took him downstairs to the kitchen, where she placed him in a highchair and put a bowl of dry cereal in front of him to eat. As he sat there, his mother left the room for a moment, and when she did, Wanda appeared next to him.

"Alright, quick now Timmy before your mom comes back, wish things back to normal." Wanda said.

"Alright. I wish.."
115221112.title: Timmy wakes up in the morning.

choices: I'll change you when you've finished eating.
1152211122.content:
"Alright. I wish everything." Timmy said, then stopped suddenly as his eyes went wide.

He bent slightly, as much as he was able to while sitting in the highchair, pulled his legs inward a bit as he became slightly red in the face.

"I, I, I wish. Oohg. I, I wish. Ah, ah! I wish every, thing!" Timmy kept trying to say, pausing and grunting while he spoke, when he then exclaimed.

"Aaah.." Sighing deeply as his face returned to it's normal hue and he became quite relaxed.

A warm sensation had begun to spread through out Timmy's diaper, coating the back of it before heading to the front, the diaper taking on a darker shade as a ghastly stench rose up from it. Wanda could hardly believe she just watched Timmy poop in his diaper, but she had little time to contemplate it as Timmy's mother came back in, causing her to poof away before she was noticed. By now the euphoric feeling of having released his bowels was wearing off, and Timmy suddenly came to terms with what he could feel in his diaper and also smell in the air, freezing like a deer in headlights as he then noticed his mother in the room with him. His mother had a hand over her nose as she looked at her son.

"Of course, as soon as I get you all cleaned up you go right ahead and make a stinky." She said as she went over and moved Timmy slightly, looking over his back.

She reached down and pulled the waistband of the diaper to check inside, immediately letting it go.

"Oh pee yew! I guess dinner finally decided to come out of you huh, certainly did a number on that diaper Timmy." She said.
1152211122.title: Interrupted by his body,

11522111222.content:
"I'll change you when you've finished eating though. I don't want to get a new diaper on you right away to have you let loose on that one too." She said, sitting down at the table.

Timmy was appalled, not only by the foul smelling mess clinging to him inside of the diaper, but by the fact that his mother was going to let him sit in it, just because she thought he wasn't done? Of course he was done! She looked back there, she could tell. He just stared off towards his mother, his cheeks puffed out in anger. His mother looked over to him when she was sitting at the table.

"Oh yup, I know that face too well." She commented.

'That face? What did she mean by that face?' Timmy thought, as suddenly a loud reverberating noise emanated from his backside and he could feel the mush spreading out through the diaper again.

The smell around him intensifying as he hung his head in shame that his mother had been right. He was betrayed by his own bowels and had added another deposit to his diaper. Now the only question that remained, was if he ate the cereal.
11522111222.title: I'll change you when you've finished ea...

115221112221.content:
Well, his mother had said she'd change him after he finished eating his cereal, and with his mother around he couldn't just have Wanda grant him a wish, so eat the cereal he did. Every single bite of it, down to the last drop, and he was full. Being younger meant he couldn't eat as much, and one bowl of cereal was definitely enough to fill him up.

"Well, you finished it all up, what a big boy you are. Now let's go change my big boys big stinky." his mother said as she went over and grabbed him, taking him back to his room and setting him on the changing table.

Timmy averted his eyes as she opened the diaper, he couldn't bear to look at what he did down there, but the smell was impossible to block out, it almost made him want to vomit, but he held it in as his mother disposed of the dirty diaper and put a new one onto him.

"Alright Timmy, mommy has a lot of errands to run, and you get to come with." she said as she grabbed him and took him.

'Wait, she wasn't going to call Vicky?' Timmy thought as his mom carted him down to the car, putting him in a baby seat in the back.

"First stop." his mother said.
115221112221.title: Eat the cereal.

1152211122212.content:
"The gym." she said.

Then his mother began driving off, taking Timmy with her to the gym, meanwhile in the backseat Wanda reappeared to Timmy in the form of a stuffed teddy bear.

"Sport, what are you going to do?" she asked him.

"Don't worry Wanda, as soon as I'm alone I can wish myself back to normal, I'm sure it won't be long." Timmy stated.

While driving along Timmy found himself to be incredibly bored. Sitting, waiting, looking out the window, idly his had reached up and he stuck a finger into his nose. He immediately realized what he was doing and stopped.

'Ugh, I'm getting used to being a toddler already.' he thought to himself as his mother pulled into the parking lot of the gym, she then grabbed Timmy out of the car and headed in. Going up to the front desk his mother said to the woman attending it.

"Hello, were here for our.."
1152211122212.title: The gym.

choices: Sat down on a bench nearby with other parents.
11522111222122.content:
"Junior swimming lessons." his mother said.

"Ah yes, here, it'll be starting in just several minutes, take him into the changing room to get him ready then leave him with the rest of the group in front of the pool." the secretary said.

'Well, at least I get to go swimming.' Timmy thought to himself as his mother took him into the changing room.

There wasn't anyone else in the changing room to bother them, so his mother took him in, pulled his shirt off, his pants, and then his diaper, replacing it with an appropriate swim diaper then pulling some yellow swim shorts over it, she then brought him out to the pool area. There was a large pool to one side, to the other was a smaller pool, with a group of toddlers and several lifeguards.

Timmy's mother took him over and set him with the other toddlers, placing him between a girl with black pigtails wearing a sort of swim dress, and another boy with orange hair who was wearing purple swim shorts.

Timmy watched his mom as she..
11522111222122.title: Junior swimming lessons.

115221112221222.content:
Timmy watched as his mother left the pool area, probably to go do some other thing in the gym while he was at this swim lesson. After a while all the toddlers were here, some parents were over on the side. Meanwhile some of the life guards began fitting the toddlers with floaties. Wanda poofed onto Timmy in the form of water wings.

"Oh Wanda, am I glad to see you." Timmy said.

"Likewise sport, but how are you going to get out of here, this place is crawling with people. Not to mention your a toddler, no ones going to let you out of their sight." Wanda explained.

"Well, I have to figure out how to get away from them. I think I have a plan, but it'll take some time." Timmy said.

"Well don't take too long sport, this class won't last forever." she said.

Then the life guards began putting the kids into the water and the lesson began.

Vicky barges into his room suddenly
121.content:
It was a normal Friday for Timmy Turner, heading home from a long boring day of school. Headed down the steps of the school, he heard a voice that sent a cold chill down his spine. "Oh TIIIMMMYYY!" He knew he didn't have long to escape and in a panic he looked around for somewhere to hide. Taking the only option he found, Timmy quickly jumped in the near by dumpster, landing softly on a ton of trash bags. Lifting the lid back up slightly, he took a peek to see if he had been successful. Where he had just been, stood the black haired girl, Tootie, scanning every inch of the grounds for him. "Hmm, I swore he was just here. He must be hiding." Closing the lid, Timmy sighed, knowing she'd never check here.

Just then, Cosmo poof'd in next to him. "Heya Timmy, whatcha doing in this dumpster? Looking for treasure? I'll help." The fairy proceeded to poof in a small row boat and began boating around with a pirate hat and eye patch on. "Cosmo, no." Timmy tried to get his attention. "I'm trying to hide from Tootie, see?" He lifted the lid up for him to see. "But she's so far away Timmy." It took a quick look back to realize Cosmo was using a telescope, although the wrong way. Timmy spun it around so he could clearly see the girl in her search. "Oh, so what are you gonna do? Sit in trash all day?" Timmy pondered his way out, "Can't I just wish her away?" The fairy responded with a shake of his head "Sorry Timmy, you know da rules... we can't interfere with true love. Buuuut, you could wish for something to make her go away." "How should I do that? What could I wish for?" Timmy was drawing a blank. "I don't know, maybe you could wish for something embarrassing to her." After some time, he finally had it. "Got it, I wish Tootie had never been potty trained." With his command, Cosmo flicked his wand in her direction as it lit up.

Curious, Timmy grabbed the telescope and peered towards Tootie. "Did it work Cosmo? I can't tell." His sight focused in on the girl who was now on her hands and knees searching for him underneath some near by cars. Her plaid skirt was slightly riding up her bottom and took his focus. Suddenly, there was some movement under her skirt as her tights expanded slightly. It was becoming easier to tell there was now some white padding showing through the black tights. If she felt anything, she didn't show any signs of it. "Is she wearing a diaper now?" Cosmo commented as both him and his godchild burst out into laughter. Suddenly, the two were joined by Wanda, who had just returned from her spa day. "What are you guys doing here and what's so funny?" Unable to breathe, Cosmo pointed out the dumpster towards Tootie. Wanda squinted to see, but the picture was clear enough for her. "Is...is that Tootie? And why is she diapered?" The boys had calmed down enough to finally give her answers. "Well, because Timmy wished away her potty training, duh." The pink haired fairy showed confusion and frustration. "Why on earth would you do that?" He shrugged, "I couldn't wish her away, so I tried to embarrass her into leaving. I thought maybe she'd pee her pants and head home." As Wanda scolded Timmy as to why that was a reckless wish, Tootie gave up her search and headed off with her head hanging down.

Timmy was finally safe at home, when he was called down from his room by his parents. "Timmy, we're going on a weekend trip to the beach." Mrs Turner told him, which excited him only to be interrupted by his father "And by we, she means me and her. You get to spend the weekend with your favorite babysitter!" With that, Vicky slid in though the doorway smiling. As they said their goodbyes, Timmy sighed and began heading back to his room where he planned to spend as much time away from Vicky as possible. He was stopped by the familiar voice again. "TIIIMMMYY!!!" Suddenly, he was locked into an also familiar death lock hug, albeit with a subtle crinkling now added to it. Struggling to get some air, he choked out "What is she doing here?" Vicky had just returned into the house with two bags around each of her shoulders "Well somebody has to watch over her and change her butt." Unfazed, Tootie replied "It's ok, I'm sure Timmy could change me!" He gave a "WHAT?" in response as Vicky couldn't care less, making her way to their tv to take her spot in front of it. Once he was free of her grip, he begrudgingly made his way back to his room with Tootie in tow.

Once in his room, Tootie began to occupy herself with all of his possessions. Sneaking over to the fishbowl, Timmy asked for some help. "Guys, can you fix this? Tootie's here and she's gonna want me to change her diapers for the weekend." Wanda was first to appear "Oh sorry Timmy, you wished for this. You're gonna deal with it for now." She was still upset clearly. "Cosmo? Please?" Timmy begged. "Sorry champ, She threatened to turn me into a baby again if I undid the wish. She'll do it too." Wanda poof'd a bonnet on top of fish Cosmo, which sent him swimming back into their castle. "Oh Timmy, can you check me? I think I wet myself." Tootie called over to him. Timmy gulped. "Good luck sport." Wanda gave her support before also disappearing into the castle.

Timmy walked over towards the girl, who was now in the middle of the room holding her skirt slightly up, revealing her diaper underneath her tights. The white padding had pink heart designs all over it. It was becoming clear that this had not embarrassed her one bit. He hesitantly reached his hand towards her crotch, finding the padding and gave it a feel. It was surprisingly fine from what he could tell. "Hey, I thought you said you were wet..." his hand was greeted by a growing warmth now, with a slight hissing noise now audible to him. His face went to disappointment as she broke the news "Oopsie, there it is. Sometimes I just can't tell when I go." After a moment, the stream died down, leaving the girl with a decently soaked diaper now. As weird as it was to him, he wasn't disgusted by what had transpired. Thinking on how to handle the situation...
121.title: A wish

choices: The new diaper she got changed into.
The same wet diaper she was in before.
1211.content:
"You know you should really ask Vicky for a change before you get a rash or something," Timmy said while pulling his hand away from her diaper. Tootie laughed at the comment explaining to Timmy that her diaper wasn't that wet and it could hold more then what was already in it. "Besides, even if I went to ask Vicky for a change, more than likely she would send be away until the diaper was almost full" Tootie said while showing Timmy her diaper again and showing how only a few of the hearts on it have disappeared. Timmy could see that the diaper still had a good amount of hearts on it and began to wonder just how much her diapers could hold, but he didn't really want to find out right now. After a bit more persistence Timmy finally got Tootie to go ask Vicky for a change and once she left, Timmy went over to his bed to think about all of this.

"Man this sure is going to be an interesting time until I can find some way out of this" Timmy said as he tried to think of ways to either undo this wish or find someway to get Tootie out of diapers. He know Cosmo and Wanda couldn't do anything about it and Wanda even told him to just deal with it for now and hopefully something good would come out of this. Timmy though seeing Tootie in a diaper was weird and especially using one, he wasn't completely disgusted by it and while she did need them because she wasn't potty trained, he wondered why she liked them so much. While Timmy was thinking, he heard his door open and when he looked up he saw Tootie enter and shut the door before walking over to him. "So did you get your diaper changed?" Timmy asked and without saying a word, Tootie showed Timmy.....
1211.title: Tell her to ask Vicky for a change

1212.content:
Suddenly, a loud bang thundered out. Vicky had just kicked in his door and made her way inside. "TWERP! What are you doing?" She questioned the boy who just now realized he hadn't yet removed his hand from Tootie's crotch. "Nothing! I-I uh..was..." Timmy's mind went blank as he tried to explain his way out the peculiar situation they were caught in. "It's ok sis, he was just checking my diaper is all." Tootie spoke up in his silence. You didn't have to be that honest. he thought as he awaited her rage. "I'll be the judge of that." Vicky stormed her way over to her sister, pushing Timmy out of the way. She quickly jammed her hand between Tootie's legs, finding her warm, soaked padding. Vicky made a bit of a judging face before removing her hand and proceeded to walk around the black haired girl. Vicky slapped her hand against Tootie's back hard, causing the girl to bend over at the waist. She quickly slipped a finger down the waistband of her tights and diaper and pulled them back. Peering inside then letting them snap back into place she gave her judgement. "You'll be fine. We both know you'll end up doing worse in them." Vicky headed back out of the room. "By the way, your parents left dinner for us tonight. It'll be ready later." She announced before slamming the door shut.

Timmy got up of the floor and dusted himself off. "Is she always that aggressive when she does that?" Tootie herself was still dealing with her sister's intrusion as well. "You know how she can be. She's not kind when she has to deal with them." The girl found a tv remote and sat down on the floor, beginning to flip through the channels. Timmy went back over to his fish bowl. "Hey guys, why are Vicky and Tootie so calm about her being in diapers? Shouldn't they find it weird?" Wanda took little time to answer him. "Well Timmy, your exact words were 'I wish Tootie had never been potty trained' so, to everyone but us this is normal for her." Cosmo just laughed. "Ha, as if that's normal for a girl her age." Wanda's wand came to life, poofing the bonnet from before but adding a pacifier this time. Cosmo retreated once again in shame. "Is he alright?" Timmy asked but was just ignored. "Look Timmy, I'm not going to let you not learn a lesson this time. Maybe actually spend some time with her and just talk to her."

Talk to her huh? Timmy was curious, if what she said was true he wanted to see just how far his wish had gone. He walked over to Tootie and sat down a few feet away. The girl had settled on Carpet Critters which almost didn't surprise him. "So, uh Tootie?" She looked over to him and quickly closed the gap between them. "Yeesss?" Timmy did his best to compose himself. "So, um... why do you wear diapers?" Tootie blushed but was eager to respond. "Because I can't use the potty silly." He sighed just a bit "Well duh. But why aren't you potty trained?" She sat in silence, thinking for a bit before speaking. "Well, I've never told anyone about this... But my mom told me, before I was born, Vicky refused to be potty trained. She tormented our mom into letting her stay in diapers. It was that or dirty undies. Once I was born, she just trained herself and hated them. So when I was old enough to start learning the potty, my mom didn't force me. She was too scared. So here I am now." Tootie lifted her skirt once again to reveal her wet diaper, as if driving the final point home.

Timmy was impressed with how much went into his wish, but one thing stuck out to him. So, Vicky didn't want to use the toilet huh? I might have to keep that in mind... Tootie suddenly got a worried look on her face. "Timmy, you don't think I'm weird for wearing them do you?" She put on her strongest looking pout and puppy dog eyes. He was taken back, he didn't want to hurt the poor girl. "I uh... No, I don't." He told her, admitting a bit of defeat. The black haired girl cheered up instantly, pouncing herself on top of Timmy, causing both of them to crash against the floor. She was now hugging him, pinning him down. "I knew you were the one, my true love. Everyone else makes fun of me but not you!" Now trapped, Timmy regretted his decision a bit. Hoping for an escape, it came in the form of...
1212.title: Vicky barges into his room suddenly

choices: Give Tootie the best time of her life
12121.content:
Being pinned against the ground, Timmy knew there was no hope. Suddenly, a noise came from Tootie's stomach. She seemed to not be aware of anything wrong. Hmm, Tootie must be hungry... or... oh no. He soon realized what Vicky likely meant earlier now. No way did he want to deal with that. He squirmed his was just far enough loose telling the girl. "T-tootie, I need to go to the bathroom, let me go." She obliged. "I'll be waiting for you" she lovingly said, adding in a blown kiss his way. Timmy headed towards the door and nodded to his fairies before leaving the room.

Once inside the bathroom, he locked the door and turned around to watch his fairies poof in. "Guys, I have to undo the wish... things about about to get... messy. The pair looked confused. "What do you mean Timmy?" He did his best to contain his panic. "I think Tootie is about to..." He couldn't quite say the words but the point was made as they gave him an 'Ahh' in response. "Please Wanda, you wouldn't force her to do that would you?" She rubbed her chin. "Well I guess that would be a bit cruel. Ok, as long as you learned your lesson this time." He nodded. "I did. Now... I wish Tootie was back to normal!" The couple raised their wands as the came to life... only to dull down and limp over to a simultaneous 'Uh-oh'. "What do you mean 'Uh-oh'?!?" Timmy exclaimed, knowing what this response had meant.

Wanda poofed in Da Rules and flipped though it. "Well sport, you know how we can't interfere with true love?" Timmy crossed his arms, clearly upset. "What does that have to do with anything?" "Well, for whatever reason it seems her diapers are tied to her love. Maybe it's because you told her that it was ok or maybe she liked wearing them before your wish." Wanda did her best to explain why the wish hadn't gone though but she herself wasn't sure. "WHAT?!? Timmy was livid but Cosmo couldn't contain it any longer. "HA! Who actually likes wearing diapers? What a baby, right Timmy?" Before he could respond Wanda finally lost it. "That's enough Cosmo!" She waved her wand and with that Cosmo was poofed into a stroller, bottle in his mouth and only wearing a diaper. "Umm, what's going on?" Timmy was completely lost. "Well Timmy, remember that time I turned him into a Mamma's boy? Turns out Cosmo likes wearing diapers. I guess I'm his mother now." Wanda turned to look at Cosmo who just ignored her and drank his bottle. "Listen Timmy, sometimes others like things you might find weird and that's ok. Just make the best of the situation." Timmy pondered on her words before finally accepting her way of thinking. "You're right Wanda, I know just what to do. I'm gonna..."
12121.title: A sound came from Tootie

choices: Vicky had came looking for them
121211.content:
"I'm gonna give Tootie the best time of her life!" Timmy exclaimed. "How so?" Wanda questioned the boy. He pondered for a minute before continuing. "I know... I wish there was a secret play room in my closet with anything she could ever want." With that, Wanda raised her wand and granted the wish. Timmy headed out of the bathroom and back towards his room. Cosmo removed the bottle from his mouth. "Do you really think he learned his lesson?" Wanda quickly shoved the bottle back into his mouth. "No talking while you're feeding! But we'll just have to see what he does now."

Timmy found Tootie sitting quietly on the floor awaiting his return. Once her eyes were set on him she bolted towards him. "TIMMY!" He managed to dodge the incoming hug which caused her to trip and slide. She quickly dusted herself off. "Maybe I should take these off, just in case." Tootie slowly removed her tights, leaving just her diaper beneath her skirt. Letting her finish first, Timmy walked over towards his closet. "Tootie, I have something that will make your evening." She took notice of the door behind him. "Oh silly Timmy, we don't have to go in there in you want seven minutes in Heaven~" Tootie puckered up as he quickly shoved her off. "Not that! Just follow me." The pair headed into the closet as Timmy moved a line of pink shirts out of the way to find a door that hadn't existed there prior to his wish.

Opening the door, the two walked into a light blue room. They took a look around at everything inside. A play set complete with a slide and play house, a box filled with toys, a bookshelf next to a little coloring area. "Uhh Timmy? Where did you get all this stuff?" Tootie curiously asked. "Uh... the internet?" He quickly lied, hoping she wouldn't ask anything further. "Works for me!" She shouted as she sprinted off towards the play set. He followed behind her and watched as she slid down the slide, completely enjoying herself. Timmy took notice of a fully stocked changing table just their height. He really hoped that wouldn't be used, as long as he could help it. But as Tootie came past him for another go, she stopped in her tracks, sending a cold chill down his spine. "You... ok there?" Timmy called out to her. "Huh? Oh... Yeah I'm fine." She responded as she headed back up to the top of the slide. He quickly peaked at the back of her exposed diaper and sighed, safe... for now.

"Timmy! Wanna color with me?" Tootie had slid down once more and was now on her way over to the bookshelf. He really didn't have much interest in joining her, but was more than happy to watch her. She reached the books and began to look for something that caught her eye. As she looked though, she didn't even notice her body start to squat on it's own. Nature was taking it's course and there was no stopping it now. Her diaper began to droop as she began to fill her pants, adding warmth to the back to go with the cooling front of it. Timmy just watched in horror, though he knew it was a matter of time before it would happen. He considered getting Vicky to deal with the mess. As he watched the last of her load settle in her pants...

We come to the house of someone more evil than Dr. Doom, Red Skull, and Paper cuts fused together. Her name was Vicky, Icky with a V, and today she shall face punishment for her sins.She was wearing black pajamas with green skulls on them as she laid in her bed. She was holding knives of all sorts looking at a picture of Timmy Turner. She threw all of the knives straight at the picture which tore it to shreds. Vicky's ears soon heard the sound of a door opening causing her to turn and see her little sister Tootie who was a bit older with her C-Cups coming in.

"What do you want twerpette?" Vicky asked throwing a knife in her direction causing it to land at Tootie's feet.

"Vicky, what if I told you there was a way to become more evil?" Tootie smirked with evil intention in her eyes. Vicky began to think about that, a way to become more evil would be a dream of hers to accomplish. She would ruin the lives of many people even the one she truly despises the most; Timmy Turner. She placed her knives on the bed and stood up so they were at eye level.

"I'm listening." Vicky stated with an villainous grin, which soon vanished as her sister produced a pack of diapers from her back. "What the heck are those for?!"

"See Vicky," Tootie began to explain. "Statistics show diapers are the most evilest thing on the face of the earth for the people around someone in a diaper. I mean look at babies, they are waited on hand and foot and they don't have to lift a finger. They don't even need to get up and use the restroom."

"That's because babies are weak and defenseless." Vicky countered.

"Are they Vicky? They choose to walk, they choose to mess their diapers? Its all an act to get people to drop their guard." Tootie counter-argued back with logic of her own. Vicky began to think about the times she had to babysit actual babies and at times it did feel like she was waiting on them hand and foot. She began to think of the pros and cons of seeing if what Tootie was saying true. Pro 1: She'd be the most evilest person ever making everyone miserable. Con 1: She would be the laughing stock of the entire town if this got out. Pro 2: She would make Timmy Turner even more miserable by making him her personal diaper slave. 15523.content:
Wanda hated every kind of underwear, bras, socks and specially panties. There was only one kind of underpants she liked: thick ruffled disposable diapers. It made her feel safe regardless of being literally topless under her clothes, and if she had an accident it won't stain her pants.

And this was the main reason why Juanisimo loved her too much. Juanisimo had a big fetish for adult baby girls. He loves to pamper, spoil, tickle and cuddle adult girls wearing nothing else but a diaper. Probably also likes seeing girls wetting themselves.

One day Cosmo crossed the line with Timmy and he in anger wished...
15523.title: Hates panties

15531.content: Winston was Jorgen' s godchild in the fairly odd parent shorts and appeared utterly terrified of him. Who diapers him?
15531.title: Winston

choices: Changed him into a diaper by hand
Ppofed a diaper on to his godchild
155311.content:
"Wakey, wakey!" a booming voice woke a terrified red head quickly before his green German Shepard loudly turned into a massive army type man with a buzz cut and a massive wand. Jorgen was excited to spend a Saturday with his godchild, Winston was puny and small so he liked feeling needed by the child as a protector. He magically lifted the child in the air to dress him and saw soaked pants.
"Oh, Winston-Again?"
"Ah! I'm sorry- sir!" Winston cried with a milteray salute he was taught to do, completely shaking until a large rubber thing was ppofed into his mouth. He nervously sucked the pacifier starting to calm down as Jorgen
